verses.verse: Give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Call <S%H7121><s%> on his name! <S%H8034><s%> Make his doings <S%H5949><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> among the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> to him, <S%H2167><s%> sing praises to him! <S%H7878><s%> Tell of all his marvelous works. <S%H6381><s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%> Let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of those who seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and his strength. <S%H5797><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> forever more. <S%H8548><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvelous works <S%H6381><s%> that he has done; <S%H6213><s%> his wonders, <S%H4159><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth, <S%H6310><s%>
you seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham, <S%H85><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> you children <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> his chosen ones. <S%H972><s%>
He is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%> His judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He has remembered <S%H2142><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations, <S%H1755><s%>
the covenant which he made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham, <S%H85><s%> his oath <S%H7621><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3446><s%>
and confirmed <S%H5975><s%> the same to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a statute; <S%H2706><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%>
saying, <S%H559><s%> "To you I will give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> the lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance; <S%H5159><s%>"
when they were but a few men <S%H4962><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> yes, <S%H4592><s%> very few, and foreigners in it. <S%H1481><s%>
They went <S%H1980><s%> about from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation, <S%H4467><s%> from one kingdom to another <S%H312><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>
He allowed <S%H3240><s%> no one <S%H120><s%> to do them wrong. <S%H6231><s%> Yes, <S%H3198><s%> he reproved kings for their sakes, <S%H4428><s%>
"Don't <S%H5060><s%> touch my anointed <S%H4899><s%> ones! <S%H5030><s%> Do my prophets no harm! <S%H7489><s%>"
He called <S%H7121><s%> for a famine <S%H7458><s%> on the land. <S%H776><s%> He destroyed <S%H7665><s%> the food <S%H3899><s%> supplies. <S%H4294><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them. <S%H3130><s%> Joseph was sold <S%H4376><s%> for a slave. <S%H5650><s%>
They bruised <S%H6031><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> with shackles. <S%H3525><s%> His <S%H5315><s%> neck was locked <S%H935><s%> in irons, <S%H1270><s%>
until the time <S%H6256><s%> that his word <S%H1697><s%> happened, <S%H935><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s word <S%H565><s%> proved him true. <S%H6884><s%>
The king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and freed <S%H5425><s%> him; <S%H4910><s%> even the ruler of peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and let him go free. <S%H6605><s%>
He made <S%H7760><s%> him lord <S%H113><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> and ruler <S%H4910><s%> of all of his possessions; <S%H7075><s%>
to discipline <S%H631><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%> at his pleasure, <S%H5315><s%> and to teach his elders <S%H2205><s%> wisdom. <S%H2449><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> lived <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
He increased <S%H6509><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> greatly, <S%H3966><s%> and made them stronger <S%H6105><s%> than their adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> to hate <S%H8130><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> to conspire <S%H5230><s%> against his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> whom he had chosen. <S%H977><s%>
They performed <S%H7760><s%> miracles <S%H226><s%> among them, <S%H4159><s%> and wonders in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham. <S%H2526><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and made it dark. <S%H2821><s%> They didn't <S%H4784><s%> rebel against his words. <S%H1697><s%>
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> into blood, <S%H1818><s%> and killed <S%H4191><s%> their fish. <S%H1710><s%>
Their land <S%H776><s%> swarmed <S%H8317><s%> with <S%H8317><s%> frogs, <S%H6854><s%> even in the rooms <S%H2315><s%> of their kings. <S%H4428><s%>
He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and swarms of flies <S%H6157><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and lice <S%H3654><s%> in all their borders. <S%H1366><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them hail <S%H1259><s%> for rain, <S%H1653><s%> with <S%H3852><s%> lightning <S%H784><s%> in their land. <S%H776><s%>
He struck <S%H5221><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> and also their fig trees, <S%H8384><s%> and shattered <S%H7665><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of their country. <S%H1366><s%>
He spoke, <S%H559><s%> and the locusts <S%H697><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and the grasshoppers, <S%H3218><s%> without number, <S%H4557><s%>
ate up <S%H398><s%> every plant <S%H6212><s%> in their land; <S%H776><s%> and ate <S%H398><s%> up the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their ground. <S%H776><s%>
He struck <S%H5221><s%> also all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in their land, <S%H776><s%> the first <S%H7225><s%> fruits of all their manhood. <S%H202><s%>
He brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold. <S%H2091><s%> There was not one feeble <S%H3782><s%> person among his tribes. <S%H7626><s%>
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they departed, <S%H3318><s%> for the fear <S%H6343><s%> of them had fallen on them. <S%H5307><s%>
He spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> for a covering, <S%H4539><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> in the night. <S%H3915><s%>
They asked, <S%H7592><s%> and he brought <S%H935><s%> quails, <S%H7958><s%> and satisfied <S%H7646><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the sky. <S%H8064><s%>
He opened <S%H6605><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and waters <S%H4325><s%> gushed out. <S%H2100><s%> They ran <S%H1980><s%> as a river <S%H5104><s%> in the dry places. <S%H6723><s%>
For he remembered <S%H2142><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> and Abraham, <S%H85><s%> his servant. <S%H5650><s%>
He brought forth <S%H3318><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with joy, <S%H8342><s%> his chosen <S%H972><s%> with singing. <S%H7440><s%>
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them the lands <S%H776><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%> They took the labor <S%H5999><s%> of the peoples <S%H3816><s%> in possession, <S%H3423><s%>
that they might keep <S%H8104><s%> his statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and observe <S%H8104><s%> his laws. <S%H8451><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%>
